title: Emacs Makes Moving Words and Lines Super Easy
description:
I'm constantly amazed at some of the cool functionality available in Emacs, both out of the box as well as with third party packages.  Today, I'm going to share a couple of neat Emacs programs that make moving words, lines and blocks of text super easy.

REFERENCED:
► https://github.com/rejeep/drag-stuff.el 
► https://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=3656
